name: WindRose Island
description:
Defends your Island! Your people has arrived to a great paradisiac island, but it is not like appear... A series of catastrophes are devasting the island. Your people must pray to their gods to appease their fury and save the town.

Team:

  • Game designer: Gonzalo Nicolás Barreales
  • Game designer: Aaron Sújar Garrido
  • Artist: Raquel Jarillo Pellón
  • Artist: Isabel Vidaurre Gallart 
  • Development: Cristian Rodríguez Bernal
